content.p: Are you aged between 16 - 17 years old? We offer a great value Young Persons sports and fitness memberships for you to enjoy our fitness facilities at David Ross Sports Village, Jubilee Sports Centre or Sutton Bonington Sports Centre. Three fitness suites equipped with the latest equipment Over 150 weekly group exercise classes Free fitness induction and programme reviews We have peak and off peak membership packages available at David Ross Sports Village and you can choose whether you pay a monthly or annual fee. Off-peak times at David Ross Sports Village are 6.30am - 3pm (Monday - Sunday). Enjoy our fitness suite at group exercise programme at any time, with our great value membership of 12 months for the price of 10! A more flexible way to make the most of our fitness suite and group exercise timetable with a monthly payment plan. Enjoy our fitness facilities in the quieter periods, with our great value annual package of 12 months for the price of 10! A flexible way to make the most of our fitness suite and group exercise timetable in our quieter periods with monthly payments. The Young Person sports and fitness membership is for people aged 16 - 17 years old. On your first visit to the sports centre, you shall need to provide proof of your age (for example your passport or provisional driving license). Our Pay as You Go prices offer a flexible way to enjoy our fitness facilities and activities. We have a wide choice of fitness classes, including Les Mills Indoor Cycling and Body Pumpâ„¢. From the swimming pool to the climbing wall, check out the full range of facilities at University of Nottingham. +44 (0)115 748 7000 sport@nottingham.ac.uk Find our opening times here.
